verses.name: Mark 2:4
verses.text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press, they uncovered the roof where he was: and when they had broken it up, they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay.

verses.name: Mark 2:5
verses.text: When Jesus saw their faith, he said unto the sick of the palsy, Son, thy sins be forgiven thee.

verses.name: Mark 2:6
verses.text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there, and reasoning in their hearts,

verses.name: Mark 2:7
verses.text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies? who can forgive sins but God only?
